description: React component 'RegionFilter' for selecting a region, connected to a global context (RegionContext). Provides a dropdown with predefined region options, updating the context and triggering external change callbacks.

methods.name: RegionFilter({ value, onChange })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a select element for region filtering. Uses context for current region state, and calls provided onChange callback when selection changes.

methods.name: handle
methods.description: Event handler for select input change; updates region in context and calls external onChange if provided.
